title: Assess the validity of a statement on econ. growth

content.question:
“Although the economic growth of the United States between 1860 and 1900 has been attributed to a governmental policy of laissez-faire, it was in fact encouraged and sustained by direct governmental intervention.”

Access the validity of this statement.

frqParts.text:
“Although the economic growth of the United States between 1860 and 1900 has been attributed to a governmental policy of laissez-faire, it was in fact encouraged and sustained by direct governmental intervention.”

Access the validity of this statement.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
